name: Colour Clash
description:
Create your own masterpiece with Colour Clash! Stop the incoming black dots from trying to reach your buildings while painting an artwork at the same time. The black dots can only be destroyed by your missiles explosions, just like in the old arcade game Missile Command.

 The style of the artwork you create is inspired by Julie Mehretu's artworks, who uses a layering of time, space and place in her artworks. I wanted to try and replicate this with having the player play the game, only to reveal that it was the artwork the entire time.

This game got it's own article in Rock Paper Shotgun: https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2017/06/19/colour-clash/amp/

Post Mortem: http://www.victorweidar.com/20...

Thanks to Kevin McLeod for the background audio
